short.ar: وأخيراً, مانع اعلانات كفوء. خفيف على المعالج و الذاكرة.
short.am,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,gu,kn,ml,: ADZbuzz fork of the famous uBlock. A multi-purpose blocker for the user, by the user.
short.bg: Най-накрая, ефективен рекламен блокер с малки изисквания за процесор и памет.
short.bn: অবশেষে, একটি কার্যকর বিজ্ঞাপন প্রতিরোধক। সিপিইউ এবং মেমরি সহায়ক।
short.ca: Finalment, un blocador eficient que utilitza pocs recursos de memòria i processador.
short.cs: Konečně efektivní blokovač, který nezatěžuje CPU a paměť.
short.da: Endelig en effektiv blocker til Chromium-baserede browsere. Lavt CPU- og hukommelsesbrug.
short.de: Endlich ein effizienter Blocker. Prozessor-freundlich und bescheiden beim Speicherbedarf.
short.el: Επιτέλους, ένας αποτελεσματικός blocker. Ελαφρύς για τον επεξεργαστή και τη μνήμη.
short.es: Por fin, un bloqueador eficiente con uso mínimo de procesador y memoria.
short.et: Lõpuks on valminud tõhus blokeerija. Protsessori- ja mälusõbralik.
short.fa: بالاخره، یک بلاکر کارآمد. کم حجم بر روی پردازنده و حافظه.
short.fi: Viimeinkin tehokas ja kevyt mainosten estäjä.
short.fil: Sa wakas! Isang magaling na blocker para sa Chromium-based browsers. Magaan sa CPU at memory.
short.fr: Un bloqueur de nuisances efficace, qui ménagera votre processeur et votre mémoire vive.
short.he: סוף סוף, חוסם יעיל. קל על המעבד והזיכרון.
short.hi: आख़िरकार, क्रोमियम-बेस्ड ब्राउज़रों के लिए एक कुशल अवरोधक। CPU और स्मृति पर आसान।
short.hr: Konačno, efikasan blokator. Lak na CPU i memoriji.
short.hu: Végre egy hatékony reklám- és követésblokkoló böngészőkhöz, amely kíméletes a processzorral és a memóriával.
short.id: Akhirnya, pemblokir iklan yang efisien. Ringan penggunaan CPU dan memori.
short.it: Finalmente, un blocker efficiente. Leggero sulla CPU e sulla memoria.
short.ja: 高効率ブロッカーが遂に登場。CPUとメモリーの負担を抑えます。
short.ko: 이 부가 기능은 효율적인 차단기입니다. CPU와 메모리에 주는 부담이 적습니다.
short.lt: Pagaliau, efektyvus blokatorius, neapkraunantis nei procesoriaus, nei darbinės atminties.
short.lv: Beidzot, efektīvs bloķētājs. Nepārslogo procesoru un atmiņu.
short.mr: शेवटी, एक कार्यक्षम ब्लॉकर क्रोमियम आधारित ब्राउझरांसाठी. सीपीयू आणि मेमरी वर सोपे जातो.
short.nl: Eindelijk, een efficiënte adblocker. Gebruikt weinig processorkracht en geheugen.
short.no: Endelig en effektiv blokkeringsutvidelse. Lavt CPU- og minnebruk.
short.pl: Nareszcie skuteczne blokowanie reklam, niskie użycie procesora i pamięci.
short.pt_BR: Finalmente, um bloqueador eficiente. Com baixo uso de memória e CPU.
short.pt_PT: Finalmente, um bloqueador eficiente. Leve na CPU e memória.
short.ro: În sfârșit, un blocant eficient. Are un impact mic asupra procesorului și memoriei.
short.ru: Наконец-то, быстрый и эффективный блокировщик для браузеров.
short.sk: Konečne efektívny blokovač, ktorý nezaťažuje CPU a pamäť.
short.sl: Končno, učinkovita, procesorju in pomnilniku prijazna razširitev za blokiranje oglasov.
short.sr: Коначно, ефикасан блокатор. Ниски процесорски и меморијски захтеви.
short.sv: Äntligen en effektiv blockerare! Snäll mot processor och minne.
short.ta: இறுதியாக, ஒரு திறமையான விளம்பரத் தடுப்பான். கணினியின் மையச் செயற்பகுதியின் மேலும் நினைவகத்தின் மேலும் இலகுவானது.
short.te: మొత్తానికి RAM ఇంకా CPU పై తేలికయిన, ఒక సమర్థవంతమైన నిరోధిని.
short.tr: Sonunda, etkili bir engelleyici. İşlemci ve belleği yormaz.
short.uk: Ефективний блокувальник реклами таки з’явився. Не навантажує процесор та пам'ять.
short.vi: Cuối cùng, đã có một công cụ chặn quảng cáo hiệu quả, tiêu tốn ít CPU và bộ nhớ.
short.zh_CN: 一款高效的网络请求过滤工具，占用极低的内存和 CPU。
short.zh_TW: 終於出現了，一個高效率的阻擋器，使用不多的 CPU 及記憶體資源。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ACKNOWLEDGEMENT: We acknowledge and will continue to do so, uBlock Origin, from which this blocker is forked from. ADZbuzz uBlock inherits the benefits of the uBlock Origin with a minor twist for ADZbuzz to be to utilize this tool to provide a win-win situation for content users and publishers alike.

Here's the detailed description quote from uBlock Origin which applies to this extension as well:

An efficient blocker: easy on memory and CPU footprint, and yet can load and enforce thousands more filters than other popular blockers out there.

Illustrated overview of its efficiency: https://github.com/gorhill/uBlock/wiki/uBlock-vs.-ABP:-efficiency-compared

Usage: The big power button in the popup is to permanently disable/enable uBlock Origin for the current web site. It applies to the current web site only, it is not a global power button.

***

Flexible, it's more than an "ad blocker": it can also read and create filters from hosts files.

Out of the box, these lists of filters are loaded and enforced:

- EasyList
- Peter Lowe’s Ad server list
- EasyPrivacy
- Malware domains

More lists are available for you to select if you wish:

- Fanboy’s Enhanced Tracking List
- Dan Pollock’s hosts file
- hpHosts’s Ad and tracking servers
- MVPS HOSTS
- Spam404
- And many others

Of course, the more filters enabled, the higher the memory footprint. Yet, even after adding Fanboy's two extra lists, hpHosts’s Ad and tracking servers, uBlock Origin still has a lower memory footprint than other very popular blockers out there.

Also, be aware that selecting some of these extra lists may lead to higher likelihood of web site breakage -- especially those lists which are normally used as hosts file.
